title: Man With No Hands /// 534
description:
Man With No Hands /// Part 1 /// 534

Part 1 of 1


www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

This week we offer some assistance in an ongoing murder investigation and we are asking for your help. On Sunday, April 9, 1989 a farmer discovered the body a male murder victim inside a barn in rural Grant County, Kentucky. The man was shot and killed and his hands were removed. Kentucky State Police need our help to identify this victim. The male victim is described as caucasian, 6 foot 4 or 5 inches tall and approximately 230lbs. He has brown hair and extensive dental work. Computer enhanced photos of this man and what he MAY have looked like are available on our website www.TrueCrimeGarage.com and the Garage’s twitter and instagram. Anyone with information should contact Kentucky State Police at 859-428-1212 or FBI VICAP at 800-634-4097.

Beer of the Week - 35K Stout Beer by Against the Grain Brewery Garage Grade - 4 out of 5 bottle caps

Our show - True Crime Garage “Off the Record” is available only on Stitcher Premium. For a FREE month of listening go to http://stitcherpremium.com/truecrimegarage and use promo code GARAGE

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
